pageContent:
FAITH AGBITA 
Georgia, Atlanta,6784881332, faithagbita2050@gmail.com 
 PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
Skilled  Senior  Database  Administrator  bringing  6years  of  experience  in  database  administration,  production 
support, design, development and implementation using MS SQL Server. Experienced in creating data base links 
across databases and performed advanced replications using SQL Server Replication, Mirroring and Always on. 
Expert  in Database Design, SQL  Server,  Backup/Recovery,  Disaster recovery  and  planning.  Skilled  in  solving 
Database  issues  with  Index fragmentation,  DBCC  checks,  Optimization  of  Query,  Data  Integrity,  Index tuning, 
Update Statistics, Error and Event Handling. Good working knowledge of extracting, transforming, and loading 
data  (ETL)  using  SSIS, DTS Import/Export  Data,  Bulk  Insert,  and  DTS Packages.  Experienced  in  Performance

data  (ETL)  using  SSIS, DTS Import/Export  Data,  Bulk  Insert,  and  DTS Packages.  Experienced  in  Performance 
Tuning, Query Optimization, Client/Server Connectivity, Database consistency checks using DBCC Utilities.

 Create the necessary indexes to improve the query performance. 
 Interacted with business analysts for understanding the reporting requirements for different users.
